H0.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. Samsung Galaxy S5

H1.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. Google Nexus 6

H2.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. HTC One M8

H3.text: The 2014 'Bendgate' controversy/publicity concerned version 6 of which famous product. IPhone6

A4.text: The iPhone 6 and 6 Plus were affected by a number of notable hardware-related issues, including concerns surrounding their rigidity (which led to incidents surrounding chassis bending, as well as degradation or outright loss of touchscreen functionality)

A5.text: Apple's internal tests found the iPhone 6 was 3.3 times more likely to bend than the iPhone 5s, while the larger iPhone 6 Plus was 7.2 times more likely to bend
